00014 static const size_t kVertexCount = 24;
00015 static const int kIndexCount = 36;
00016 
00017 Cube::Cube() : width_(1), height_(1) {
00018   eye_[0] = eye_[1] = 0.0f;
00019   eye_[2] = 2.0f;
00020   orientation_[0] = 0.0f;
00021   orientation_[1] = 0.0f;
00022   orientation_[2] = 0.0f;
00023   orientation_[3] = 1.0f;
00024 }
00025 
00026 Cube::~Cube() {
00027   glDeleteBuffers(3, cube_vbos_);
00028   glDeleteProgram(shader_program_object_);
00029 }
00030 
00031 void Cube::PrepareOpenGL() {
00032   CreateShaders();
00033   CreateCube();
00034   glClearColor(1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f);
00035   glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST);
00036 }
00037 
00038 void Cube::Resize(int width, int height) {
00039   width_ = std::max(width, 1);
00040   height_ = std::max(height, 1);
00041   // Set the viewport
00042   glViewport(0, 0, width_, height_);
00043   // Compute the perspective projection matrix with a 60 degree FOV.
00044   GLfloat aspect = static_cast<GLfloat>(width_) / static_cast<GLfloat>(height_);
00045   transform_4x4::LoadIdentity(perspective_proj_);
00046   transform_4x4::Perspective(perspective_proj_, 60.0f, aspect, 1.0f, 20.0f);
00047 }
00048 
00049 void Cube::Draw() {
00050   glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00051 
00052   // Compute a new model-view matrix, then use that to make the composite
00053   // model-view-projection matrix: MVP = MV . P.
00054   GLfloat model_view[16];
00055   ComputeModelViewTransform(model_view);
00056   transform_4x4::Multiply(mvp_matrix_, model_view, perspective_proj_);
00057 
00058   glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, cube_vbos_[0]);
00059   glUseProgram(shader_program_object_);
00060   glEnableVertexAttribArray(position_location_);
00061   glVertexAttribPointer(position_location_,
00062                         3,
00063                         GL_FLOAT, 
00064                         GL_FALSE,
00065                         3 * sizeof(GLfloat),
00066                         NULL);
00067   glEnableVertexAttribArray(color_location_);
00068   glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, cube_vbos_[1]);
00069   glVertexAttribPointer(color_location_,
00070                         3,
00071                         GL_FLOAT, 
00072                         GL_FALSE,
00073                         3 * sizeof(GLfloat),
00074                         NULL);
00075   glUniformMatrix4fv(mvp_location_, 1, GL_FALSE, mvp_matrix_);
00076   glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, cube_vbos_[2]);
00077   glDrawElements(GL_TRIANGLES, kIndexCount, GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT, 0);
00078   glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
00079   glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
00080 }
00081 
00082 bool Cube::CreateShaders() {
00083   const char vertex_shader_src[] =  
00084     "uniform mat4 u_mvpMatrix;                   \n"
00085     "attribute vec4 a_position;                  \n"
00086     "attribute vec3 a_color;                     \n"
00087     "varying lowp vec4 v_color;                  \n"
00088     "void main()                                 \n"
00089     "{                                           \n"
00090     "   v_color.xyz = a_color;                   \n"
00091     "   v_color.w = 1.0;                         \n"
00092     "   gl_Position = u_mvpMatrix * a_position;  \n"
00093     "}                                           \n";
00094   
00095   const char fragment_shader_src[] =
00096     "varying lowp vec4 v_color;                   \n"
00097     "void main()                                  \n"
00098     "{                                            \n"
00099     "  gl_FragColor = v_color;                    \n"
00100     "}                                            \n";
00101   
00102   // Load the shaders and get a linked program object
00103   shader_program_object_ =
00104       shader_util::CreateProgramFromVertexAndFragmentShaders(
00105       vertex_shader_src, fragment_shader_src);
00106   if (shader_program_object_ == 0)
00107     return false;
00108   position_location_ = glGetAttribLocation(shader_program_object_,
00109                                            "a_position");
00110   color_location_ = glGetAttribLocation(shader_program_object_, "a_color");
00111   mvp_location_ = glGetUniformLocation(shader_program_object_, "u_mvpMatrix");
00112   return true;
00113 }
00114 
00115 void Cube::CreateCube() {
00116   static const GLfloat cube_vertices[] = {
00117     // Vertex coordinates interleaved with color values
00118     // Bottom
00119     -0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f,
00120     -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f,
00121     0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f,
00122     0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f,
00123     // Top
00124     -0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f,
00125     -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f,
00126     0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f,
00127     0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f,
00128     // Back
00129     -0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f,
00130     -0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f,
00131     0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f,
00132     0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f,
00133     // Front
00134     -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f,
00135     -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f,
00136     0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f,
00137     0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f,
00138     // Left
00139     -0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f,
00140     -0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f,
00141     -0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f,
00142     -0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f,
00143     // Right
00144     0.5f, -0.5f, -0.5f,
00145     0.5f, -0.5f, 0.5f,
00146     0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f,
00147     0.5f, 0.5f, -0.5f
00148   };
00149 
00150   static const GLfloat cube_colors[] = {
00151     // Vertex coordinates interleaved with color values
00152     // Bottom
00153     1.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00154     1.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00155     1.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00156     1.0, 0.0, 0.0,
00157     // Top
00158     0.0, 1.0, 0.0,
00159     0.0, 1.0, 0.0,
00160     0.0, 1.0, 0.0,
00161     0.0, 1.0, 0.0,
00162     // Back
00163     0.0, 0.0, 1.0,
00164     0.0, 0.0, 1.0,
00165     0.0, 0.0, 1.0,
00166     0.0, 0.0, 1.0,
00167     // Front
00168     1.0, 0.0, 1.0,
00169     1.0, 0.0, 1.0,
00170     1.0, 0.0, 1.0,
00171     1.0, 0.0, 1.0,
00172     // Left
00173     1.0, 1.0, 0.0,
00174     1.0, 1.0, 0.0,
00175     1.0, 1.0, 0.0,
00176     1.0, 1.0, 0.0,
00177     // Right
00178     0.0, 1.0, 1.0,
00179     0.0, 1.0, 1.0,
00180     0.0, 1.0, 1.0,
00181     0.0, 1.0, 1.0
00182   };
00183 
00184   static const GLushort cube_indices[] = {
00185     // Bottom
00186     0, 2, 1,
00187     0, 3, 2,
00188     // Top
00189     4, 5, 6,
00190     4, 6, 7,
00191     // Back
00192     8, 9, 10,
00193     8, 10, 11,
00194     // Front
00195     12, 15, 14,
00196     12, 14, 13,
00197     // Left
00198     16, 17, 18,
00199     16, 18, 19,
00200     // Right
00201     20, 23, 22,
00202     20, 22, 21
00203   };
00204 
00205   // Generate the VBOs and upload them to the graphics context.
00206   glGenBuffers(3, cube_vbos_);
00207   glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, cube_vbos_[0]);
00208   glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER,
00209                kVertexCount * sizeof(GLfloat) * 3,
00210                cube_vertices,
00211                GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00212   glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, cube_vbos_[1]);
00213   glBufferData(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER,
00214                kVertexCount * sizeof(GLfloat) * 3,
00215                cube_colors,
00216                GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00217   glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
00218   glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, cube_vbos_[2]);
00219   glBufferData(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER,
00220                kIndexCount * sizeof(GL_UNSIGNED_SHORT),
00221                cube_indices,
00222                GL_STATIC_DRAW);
00223   glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0);
00224 }
00225 
00226 void Cube::ComputeModelViewTransform(GLfloat* model_view) {
00227   // This method takes into account the possiblity that |orientation_|
00228   // might not be normalized.
00229   double sqrx = orientation_[0] * orientation_[0];
00230   double sqry = orientation_[1] * orientation_[1];
00231   double sqrz = orientation_[2] * orientation_[2];
00232   double sqrw = orientation_[3] * orientation_[3];
00233   double sqrLength = 1.0 / (sqrx + sqry + sqrz + sqrw);
00234 
00235   transform_4x4::LoadIdentity(model_view);
00236   model_view[0] = (sqrx - sqry - sqrz + sqrw) * sqrLength;
00237   model_view[5] = (-sqrx + sqry - sqrz + sqrw) * sqrLength;
00238   model_view[10] = (-sqrx - sqry + sqrz + sqrw) * sqrLength;
00239 
00240   double temp1 = orientation_[0] * orientation_[1];
00241   double temp2 = orientation_[2] * orientation_[3];
00242   model_view[1] = 2.0 * (temp1 + temp2) * sqrLength;
00243   model_view[4] = 2.0 * (temp1 - temp2) * sqrLength;
00244 
00245   temp1 = orientation_[0] * orientation_[2];
00246   temp2 = orientation_[1] * orientation_[3];
00247   model_view[2] = 2.0 * (temp1 - temp2) * sqrLength;
00248   model_view[8] = 2.0 * (temp1 + temp2) * sqrLength;
00249   temp1 = orientation_[1] * orientation_[2];
00250   temp2 = orientation_[0] * orientation_[3];
00251   model_view[6] = 2.0 * (temp1 + temp2) * sqrLength;
00252   model_view[9] = 2.0 * (temp1 - temp2) * sqrLength;
00253   model_view[3] = 0.0;
00254   model_view[7] = 0.0;
00255   model_view[11] = 0.0;
00256 
00257   // Concatenate the translation to the eye point.
00258   model_view[12] = -eye_[0];
00259   model_view[13] = -eye_[1];
00260   model_view[14] = -eye_[2];
00261   model_view[15] = 1.0;
00262 }
00263 
00264 }  // namespace tumbler
